ygData.subject: Re: TEstament of Vanear!

ygData.messageBody:
<!doctype html public "-//w3c//dtd html 4.0 transitional//en">
<html>
Mushin wrote:
<blockquote TYPE=CITE>From: "Mushin" <mushin@...>
<p>I have just aquired the Testament of Vanear and I am quite impressed
with my
<br>trophy! I am wondering however if this +10 WIS +10 Mana Item is useable
or
<br>am I only able to return it to the paladin in Erudin
<p>Any help/advice is appreciated.
<p>Thanks
<br>Mushin
<br> </blockquote>
Its Not usable at the Moment  by is suppose to be implemented in a
few patches .. so keep hold of it ...
<br> 
<br> 
<p>--
<p>Jamie Macdonald
<p>A.K.A
<br>Magis DarkStone
<br>Mercenary Mage
<br>Erollisi Marr
<p>-----------------------------------------------------------
<p>"I've been a Wizard, Magician, Sorcerer, And Charlatan."
<p>"Knowledge Is Power, Learn how to use It"
<p>"Two are 10 times more powerful than One"
<br>-----------------------------------------------------------
